name: Tiles Of Chaos
description:
Tiles of Chaos is:

1. A Puzzle Game release.
2. A Chiptune Music release.
3. A Music Asset Pack for GB Studio.

Run through an endless series of random generated tile-based puzzles, and solve as many as you can!

Follow your instinct, follow clues; move, merge and exchange tiles on the grid, before you run out of moves!

Beware of Random Chaos events!
These will unexpectedly break your strategy by changing your objective!

As you make progress and improve your puzzle-solving skills, you will be able to unlock additional music tracks! 

Features:

  • Minimalist design
  • Simple, yet challenging and addictive
  • High replay value through randomization
  • Battery saving cartridge support
  • Original Game Mechanics
  • Original Graphics
  • 10 Original Music tracks available as a Music Asset pack for GB Studio.
  • Player's Instruction Manual.
  • Created using  GB Studio version 1.2.2

Game status is currently 100% complete and fully playable.
Digital Release Date Version: R5.
New versions might come available to address any bugs that might show up.

Music tracks in this game  are available as a Music Asset pack, for you to re-use in your GB Studio projects.
MilkyTracker source .xm files and ready-to-use GB Studio .mod files are included.
Just add the mod files to your project and you're ready to go - use these music files however you want.

A note before you buy:

Music playback might show issues when playing the game.
Music might sound choppy, or it may slow down.
This can be most noticed when playing puzzles.
This is a known issue and it’s a limitation coming from the tool used to create this game.
Fortunately, there are many other ways to enjoy seamless playback in the game.

Thanks for your support!
